data.title: Book Review On The Saint The Surfer and The Ceo
data.meta_description: Book Review on the saint the surfer and the ceo - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a book review of Robin Sharma's self-help book "The Saint, Surfer and CEO". It summarizes the key advice and lessons from the book in 4 sections. The review finds the book to be generally decent and providing some practical advice and motivation. However, it notes the storytelling could have been better developed and some statements contradict the reviewer's beliefs. Overall, it recommends the book for those seeking guidance on success, personality development and living purposefully.
data.text: Book Review On The Saint The Surfer and The Ceo
